properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 10 at 11:57AM EST until February 11 at 2:49AM EST by NWS Blacksburg VA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Virginia...

Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County


Minor flooding continues along the Dan River at South Boston.
The river should fall below flood stage later today or
this evening.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Dan River at South Boston.
* until late tonight.
* at 11AM Monday the stage was 25.7 feet and falling.
* Flood stage is 22.0 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by late this
afternoon.
* Impact...at 27.0 feet...Water approaches route 501.
* Flood history...this crest compares to a previous crest of 25.0
feet on Dec 23 2018.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive through flooded areas...the water may be much deeper
than you think.

Graphical forecast information is available on the internet at
http://www.weather.gov/rnk (lower case). Click on 'rivers & lakes'.



The next scheduled statement will be issued when the river falls
below flood stage, or by early this evening.
